com.easemob.chat

类 EMChat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.easemob.chat.EMChat

  • public class EMChat
extends java.lang.Object
    此类用来初始化环信和配置各种初始化参数，一般情况下都会在Application:onCreate里初始化一次即可 Easemob IM initializer, which is used to initialize the easmob IM SDK and config the sdk options 
         EMChat.getInstance().init(application_context);

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      EMChat() 

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void enalbeDNSConfig(boolean enabled)
      不对外开放，仅用来测试 for testing purpose, is not opened for APPS
      Context getAppContext()
      获取全局上下文 get app context
      java.lang.String getAppkey()
      返回appkey get appkey
      static EMChat getInstance()
      get global EMChat instance
      java.lang.String getVersion()
      获取环信sdk 的版本 get sdk version
      void init(Context context)
      初始化 环信SDK init easemob IM SDK
      boolean isLoggedIn()
      返回是否登录过但之后没有退出登录
      登录成功过没调logout方法，这个方法的返回值一直是true，
      如果需要判断当前是否连接到服务器，使用EMChatManager.isConnected()方法 used to check if user has been logged in before successfully but did not logout if(EMChat.getInstance().isLoggedIn()){ // 直接进入主界面 }else{ // 进入登录界面进行登录 }
      void setAppInited()
      SDK 会发送broadcast intent 通知UI，比如好友邀请。
      void setAppkey(java.lang.String appkey)
      设置appkey
      void setAutoLogin(boolean autoLogin)
      设置SDK启动是是否自动连接聊天服务器。
      void setDebugMode(boolean debugMode)
      debugMode == true 时，sdk 会在log里输入调试信息
      void setEnv(EMChatConfig.EMEnvMode mode)
      设置测试环境/生产环境 建议各app测试时设置测试环境
      void setInitSingleProcess(boolean value)
      设置sdk 只初始化一次 -- 在主进程初始化 缺省是true 如果设成false，application 需要保证环信sdk 只被初始化一次
      void setLogMode(com.easemob.util.EMLog.ELogMode logMode) 
      void setPassword(java.lang.String pwd)
      已过时。  
      void setServerAddress(java.lang.String[] imServers, java.lang.String[] restServers)
      the server string should strictly follow the rule: server_address:port for example: 212.23.34.88:443 if port is not found for im server, 443 is used by default and 80 is used for rest server.
      void setUserName(java.lang.String name)
      已过时。  
      void uploadLog(EMCallBack callback)
      upload the log zip file to remote server for further analyze the code issues

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        public static EMChat getInstance()
        get global EMChat instance
        返回:

      • setDebugMode

        public void setDebugMode(boolean debugMode)
        debugMode == true 时，sdk 会在log里输入调试信息
        参数:
        debugMode -

      • setLogMode

        public void setLogMode(com.easemob.util.EMLog.ELogMode logMode)
        参数:
        logMode -

      • setAutoLogin

        public void setAutoLogin(boolean autoLogin)
        设置SDK启动是是否自动连接聊天服务器。 缺省值是true set if enable auto login, and that's true by default. auto login means you don't need to call login api explictly if login before but without logout since sdk will automaticly call login for app
        参数:
        autoLogin -

      • setAppInited

        public void setAppInited()
        SDK 会发送broadcast intent 通知UI，比如好友邀请。 UI 初始化过程中，注册broadcast receiver 之后，需要调用此函数通知SDK：可以发broadcast 事件了 一般在mainactivity.onCreate() 结束之前调用 in order to avoid the event missing by caching the event in sdk, app need to notify the sdk, app is ready for receving the events, so the events will be sent out after this api is called.

      • setInitSingleProcess

        public void setInitSingleProcess(boolean value)
        设置sdk 只初始化一次 -- 在主进程初始化 缺省是true 如果设成false，application 需要保证环信sdk 只被初始化一次

      • uploadLog

        public void uploadLog(EMCallBack callback)
        upload the log zip file to remote server for further analyze the code issues
        参数:
        callback -

      • setUserName

        public void setUserName(java.lang.String name)
        已过时。

        public void setPassword(java.lang.String pwd)

        返回:
        SDK版本，例如 "2.0.2"

        参数:

      • enalbeDNSConfig

        public void enalbeDNSConfig(boolean enabled)
        不对外开放，仅用来测试 for testing purpose, is not opened for APPS
        参数:

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn()
        返回是否登录过但之后没有退出登录
        登录成功过没调logout方法，这个方法的返回值一直是true，
        如果需要判断当前是否连接到服务器，使用EMChatManager.isConnected()方法 used to check if user has been logged in before successfully but did not logout if(EMChat.getInstance().isLoggedIn()){ // 直接进入主界面 }else{ // 进入登录界面进行登录 }
        返回:

      • setServerAddress

        public void setServerAddress(java.lang.String[] imServers,
                             java.lang.String[] restServers)
        the server string should strictly follow the rule: server_address:port for example: 212.23.34.88:443 if port is not found for im server, 443 is used by default and 80 is used for rest server. If use https protocol, the example is: https://212.23.34.88:443
        参数:
        imServers -
        restServers -
